Please insert your name according to your passport. Make sure that you write the gender, date of birth, passport number and expiry date, exactly as your passport. Modification to any passenger information is not always allowed or you may have to pay an extra charge to do so. Passport validity should be at least 6 months after your departure date.

You are not allowed to use any special character on your name. Special characters like accents, hyphens, or any other punctuation marks are not allowed (i.e *, -, @, etc). You cannot use any spaces in your last name (Surname), but you can use spaces in your given name. (If your full name is AHMED TAOHID RAFI, you can not write TAOHID RAFI in the last name, as last name does not allow using spaces, you can, however, write AHMED TAOHID in the Given Name, and RAFI in the last name.)

If your first name or middle name is too long, consider using just the initial. However, the last name (Surname) should not be modified. However, if your last name is too long, we suggest you to call our hotline for support or book tickets directly from our office.

We need you to fill up all the information according to your passport, as bookings done from ShareTrip will use the name you entered on the app or website. The airport authority will not let you fly in case of any mismatch in the name or any other information with your passport. So we request you to enter the name, expiry date, DOB, and other required information exactly as per your passport.

ShareTrip Ltd built the ShareTrip app as a Free app. This SERVICE is provided by ShareTrip Ltd at no cost and is intended for use as is.

This page provides an overview of our policies governing the collection, use, and disclosure of personally identifying information (“Personal Information”) of those who use our Service.

By using our Service, you agree that we may collect and use your Personal Information. The Personal Information that we collect is used for providing and improving the Service. We will not use or share your Personal Information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which is accessible at ShareTrip unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.

Information Collection and Use

ShareTrip collects the following personal sensitive information from you while transacting through ShareTrip, this includes your Name and Sex, Phone Number, Email Address, Billing Address, and Date of birth.

ShareTrip does not sell or trade upon any of the above foregoing information without the consent of the user or customer. ShareTrip does not store any credit/debit card details and all card related information is stored at the respective bank after the selection of the payment gateway.

The foregoing information collected from the users/customers/travelers is put to the following use:
 Customer name, address, phone number, travelers name, and age are shared with applicable service providers like the airlines, hotels, etc., for the purpose of reservation and booking the services for the customer/traveler.

Information like Phone number, email address and billing address may be used for promotional purposes, unless the customer/user has unsubscribed from such services. If you choose not to share this information, you can still visit the ShareTrip website, but you may be unable to access certain options, offers, and services.

Log Data

When you use our Service, in case of an error in the app we collect data and information on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing our Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.

Cookies

Cookies are files with small amount of data that is commonly used as an anonymous unique identifier. These are sent to your browser from the website that you visit and are stored on your device internal memory.

This Service does not use these “cookies” explicitly. However, the app may use third party code and libraries that use “cookies” to collect information and to improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.

Service Providers

We may employ third-party companies and individuals for the following:

  • To facilitate our Service;
  • To provide the Service on our behalf; or
  • To perform Service-related services.

These third parties have access to your Personal Information during the performance of certain tasks that we assign to them. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.

Security

We value your trust in providing us with your Personal Information, and we are using commercially acceptable means of protecting it. We are caution, however, that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

Children’s Privacy

This Service is not for use by anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect Personal Information from children under 13. If we discover that a child under 13 has provided us with personal information, we will immediately delete it from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you become aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately so that we can delete the information from our servers.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. These changes are effective immediately after they are posted on this page.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.

string-array.name: covid_prevention_info
string-array.item: Maintain a distance of 6 feet (2 meters) between you and others as much as possible.
Avoid contact with anyone who is sick
Limit contact with frequently touched surfaces, such as handrails, elevator buttons and kiosks. If you must touch these surfaces, use hand sanitizer or wash your hands afterward.
Clean your hands often. It’s especially important after going to the bathroom, before eating, and after coughing, sneezing or blowing your nose.

resources.string:
Travel Advice:

  1. Travel recommendations are based on each country’s travel restriction information. Recommendations integrate entry/exit restriction policies with pubic information about travel restrictions by local governments and are provided for users to form a decision about travel.
  2. In the event of failure to display inaccurate information regarding the location, an error will occur. In this case, please decide after careful consideration of policy information whether it is safe to travel.
  3. In addition to considering your current location and travel history from the past 14 days, we recommend reviewing relevant policy information in detail and deciding whether it is safe to travel.

                                                                   

Regarding COVID-19 notices issued by local governments:

  1. Data of current entry restrictions are gathered from official sources and publicly available information.
  2. The recommendations presented here are for reference only. While every effort is made to ensure the accuracy of the information, policies may change with little to no warning.

 

Regarding COVID-19 travel restrictions:

The outbreak of Covid-19 continues to cause international concern. Some countries and regions have responded with travel restrictions and advisories. The safety of travelers is our top priority. ShareTrip offers the above information of official entry restrictions and conditions to customers for reference only. We only provide entry policy information for the destinations where we offer products and services on ShareTrip. User nationalities are not considered in search results. When selecting a country/region visited in the past 14 days, search results will assume by default that you have traveled to cities/areas severely affected by COVID-19 in that destination. The status of a destination does not account for the status of the country/region’s official travel prohibitions, warnings, announcements, and advisories. This page will be kept up-to-date, but we urge all travelers to confirm travel restrictions with the relevant authorities. ShareTrip continues to monitor the situation to ensure the safety of all travelers and urges travelers to remain vigilant at all times and take all necessary precautionary measures to support their health and the well-being of others and consider the advice of the local authorities.

 

Regarding COVID-19 real-time data:

Information regarding COVID-19 is sourced from official national/regional reports and authorized media outlets.
For booking Saudia Airlines (SV) flights, Passenger’s with single name has to insert Passenger’s Father’s name as in passport in the GIVEN Name Field, as per Saudia(SV) airlines guideline.
No application found to send email.
Please provide a valid phone number with proper country code. Ex: +88 01234567890
Please enter your name as it appears on your passport. Visit the Name Guideline page to know more in details.
RT-PCR test is mandatory for all international travels from Govt. approved labs.

Pay attention to the following notifications in the CANCELLATIONS section:

TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE — the ticket is non-refundable;
TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE FOR CANCEL/REFUND — the ticket is non-refundable;
REFUND IS NOT PERMITTED — the ticket is non-refundable;
ANY TIME TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE — the ticket is non-refundable;
TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF NO-SHOW — the ticket cannot be refunded in case of no-show.

Change rules are described in the section with the CHANGES subtitle.

The CHANGES ARE NOT PERMITTED line means that you cannot make any changes and in such a case, you are not allowed to change the date/time/route of the flight.
Meal and wheelchair services are accessible if provided by the airlines (depends on availability).
